item.Q:
Write the character:
today; modern; present; current; this; now
item.A:
jīn
今天 jīntiān today; at the present; now

item.Q:
Write the character:
substitute; to replace; generation; dynasty; age; period; (historical or geological) era
item.A:
dài
代表 dàibiǎo representative; delegate; to represent; to stand for

item.Q:
Write the character:
to receive; to answer (the phone); to meet or welcome sb; to connect; to catch; to join; to extend; to take one's turn on duty; take over for sb
item.A:
jiē
直接 zhíjiē direct (opposite of indirect); immediate; directly; straightforward

item.Q:
Write the character:
surname
item.A:
traditional: 張
Zhāng
主张 (主張) zhǔzhāng to advocate; to stand for; view; position; stand; proposition; viewpoint; assertion

item.Q:
Write the character:
gas; air; smell; weather; vital breath; to anger; to get angry; to be enraged
item.A:
traditional: 氣
qì
空气 (空氣) kōngqì air; atmosphere

item.Q:
Write the character:
to test; to try; experiment; examination; test
item.A:
试 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 試
shì
试验 (試驗) shìyàn experiment; test; experimental

item.Q:
Write the character:
to receive; to accept; to suffer; subjected to; to bear; to stand; pleasant; (passive marker)
item.A:
shòu
受到 shòudào to receive; to suffer; obtained; given

item.Q:
Write the character:
near; close (to); approximately
item.A:
jìn
最近 zuìjìn recent; recently; soon

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: air; sky; empty; free time; in vain
2: emptied; leisure
item.A:
1: kōng 2: kòng
空气 (空氣) kōngqì air; atmosphere 空隙 kòngxì crack; gap between two objects; gap in time between two events
